title: Pakistan embassy hosts event with athletes representing Pakistan at Paris 2024 Olympics
content:
PARIS, Jul 26 (APP):The Pakistan embassy Paris hosted a meet and greet event on Friday with the athletes representing Pakistan at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
Federal Minister for Inter-Provincial Coordination Rana Sanaullah Khan who will represent Government of Pakistan at the Olympics Opening Ceremony was the Chief Guest of the event.
Members of Pakistani diaspora, media and many other friends attended the event and were excited to mingle with the members of the Pakistan Olympic contingent including Javelin Thrower Arshad Nadeem, swimmers Jehanara Nabi & M. Ahmed Durrani and sprinter Faiqa Riaz.
